events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate John Doe, including a detailed resume and cover letter.
The application for John Doe has been categorized under Engineering based on the role being Software Engineer and the keywords found in the resume.
Recruiter Sarah Smith has been assigned to handle the candidacy of John Doe for the Software Engineer opening to coordinate next steps.
Completed the initial phone screening with John Doe. The candidate demonstrated strong fundamentals in software development and problem-solving skills.
John Doe responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed to the technical interview stage.
Technical interview has been scheduled with John Doe for May 6th at 10:00 AM UTC to evaluate coding skills and software design abilities.
